Judul: World���s scientists pay tribute to Stephen Hawking: The physicist and science icon died at his home in Cambridge, UK, aged 76.
Abstrak:
Stephen Hawking, one of the most influential physicists of the twentieth century and perhaps the most
celebrated icon of contemporary science, died on 14 March at the age of 76. Since his early twenties, Hawking had lived with amyotrophic lateral sclerosis (ALS), a disease in which motor neurons die, leaving the brain incapable of controlling muscles. His health had reportedly been deteriorating.
Fakultas: Fakultas Matematika dan Ilmu Pengetahuan Alam
